name: Generic
overview: Remotely trigger flag changes using a unique webhook URL.
description: Remotely trigger flag changes using a unique webhook URL.
details: Triggers let you remotely execute flag changes. You can set up generic triggers to work with any service that fires a webhook. Use a generic trigger from scripts, in-house tools, and monitoring or tracker services to turn flags on or off directly from your application.
author: LaunchDarkly
